paragraphs.title: Use SQL to Show Most desirable users by Rating Count
paragraphs.text: %sql SELECT itemid, avg(rating) as average FROM ratings GROUP BY itemid ORDER BY average DESC LIMIT 5

paragraphs.title: Show The Items With The Highest Average Rating
paragraphs.text:
val mostDesirableItemsOnAverageDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT itemid, avg(rating) as average FROM ratings GROUP BY itemid").filter($"average" > 7).where($"average" <= 10)
z.show(mostDesirableItemsOnAverageDF)
